price: Maka apakah mereka merasa aman dari azab Allah (yang tidak terduga-duga)? Tiadalah yang merasa aman dari azab Allah kecuali orang-orang yang merugi.
arabic: أَفَأَمِنُواْ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِۚ فَلَا يَأۡمَنُ مَكۡرَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afa-aminū makra al-lahi falā yamanu makra al-lahi illā al-qawmu al-khāsirūna
